import React, {useState, useEffect} from "react"; import '../App'; import axios from "axios"; import { useAppContext } from "./context/appContext"; import {Navigate, useNavigate} from 'react-router-dom'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const Home = () =>{ return (

FinancialLiteracy

"An investment in knowledge pays the best interest."

Welcome to our Financial Literacy Resource Hub! Our mission is to provide detailed, easy-to-understand information on critical financial topics such as bank accounts, credit, taxes, budgeting, student loans and financing, insurance, and investing. What sets this platform apart is our commitment to accessibility: all content is available for translation into various languages directly on the page. This feature ensures that people from diverse linguistic backgrounds can access the resources they need to build their financial knowledge. By offering multilingual support, we aim to increase the reach of financial literacy, especially in underrepresented communities where language barriers may limit access to crucial information. Our goal is to empower everyone to take charge of their financial future, providing them with the knowledge to make informed decisions, avoid debt, and manage their finances responsibly. Whether you’re a beginner or looking to expand your financial understanding, our site is designed to be a comprehensive guide, breaking down complex concepts and making them accessible to all.

Resources

Bank Accounts

Credit

Taxes

Budgeting

Student Loans

Insurance

Investing

Inspiration

This project was also motivated by the clear financial literacy gap seen in different communities. Research has shown that Black and Hispanic individuals, both in their youth and adulthood, tend to have lower financial literacy rates compared to their White and Asian counterparts. I wanted to create a resource that could help close this gap, providing accessible and comprehensive financial knowledge to those who need it most, so they can take control of their financial futures and reach their goals.
